alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 3:11AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 to 6 inches between 5000 and 7000 feet elevation, 6 to 10 inches above 7000 feet, and 12 to 15 inches near peaks possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains, Chiricahua Mountains, Dragoon and Mule and Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From early Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause visibility reductions in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
